items.title: B2B Apprenticeship
items.description: SCIP’s Business-to-Business Apprenticeship trains students to pitch ideas and gain business skills to work for startups and small businesses.

items.title: Annual Executive Summer Leadership Program
items.description: Equips SCIP leaders with mentorship, skills, and hands-on experience in marketing, fundraising, journalism, IT.

items.title: Annual Fellows Leadership Program
items.description: Allows SCIP students to continue training and support events with flexible, mentor-led work focused on communication and time management during Fall/Winter.

items.title: Annual Golf Leadership Academy
items.description: Trains young leaders’ to develop focus, perseverance, and professionalism for success in Corporate America by playing Golf.

partner.title: Why Partner with SCIP?
partner.descriptionL1: We create direct connections between industry leaders and the next generation of innovators.
partner.descriptionL2: SCIP connects startups, companies, and entrepreneurs with diverse, high-performing talent worldwide, helping partners solve challenges, spark growth, and expand their global reach.
partner.descriptionL3: Partner with SCIP to invest in talent, drive innovation, and shape the future!
